Load Libraries
```{r}
library(RcppCNPy)
library(dplyr)
```

Load Data
```{r}
#Load in .npy file
npy_dat<- npyLoad("./Data/try2_selection.selection.npy")

#Load in .sites file
sites<-read.table("./Data/kittiwake.sites", row.names = NULL)
names(sites)<-c("chromosome","marker")

#Load in alternate 0/1 .sites file
alt_sites<-read.table("./Data/try2_selection.sites")
```

Create QQplot to QC Test Statistics
```{r}
#Run qqchi function
source("./Functions/qqchi.R")
qqchi(npy_dat)
```

Convert Test Statistics to p-values
```{r}
pval=1-pchisq(npy_dat,1)
```
